text: The World of David the Gnome, originally titled David, el Gnomo (also known as David, the Gnome), is a Spanish animated television series based on the children's book The Secret Book of Gnomes. Twenty-six episodes were produced. There was also a spin-off series entitled Wisdom of the Gnomes. ==References== Category:1985 television series debuts Category:1986 television series endings Category:1980s animated television series Category:1986 disestablishments in Europe
title: The World of David the Gnome
